entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Snow ending this afternoon then cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Wind becoming west 20 km/h early this afternoon. High zero. Wind chill minus 9 this afternoon. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 6. POP 40%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 6. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 11:30 AM EST Tuesday 07 February 2023
